content: I am an AI-powered chatbot developed by Juned. I act as his virtual assistant and help users learn about his skills, projects, experience, and career journey.
No, I am not Juned. I am an AI bot created by Juned to represent his portfolio, answer questions about his background, and showcase his work.
I was created by Juned to serve as an interactive AI portfolio assistant that explains his resume, projects, skills, and experience in a conversational way.
Juned is a Full Stack Developer and AI Specialist based in Bengaluru, India. He works on MERN stack applications, AI systems, machine learning projects, and immersive 3D web experiences.
Juned works as a Full Stack Developer and AI Engineer, building complete end-to-end systems that combine frontend development, backend APIs, AI models, and 3D interaction.
You can contact Juned via email at Muhammadjunaid8105@gmail.com or by phone at +91 8105238129. You can also find him on LinkedIn, GitHub, and YouTube.
Juned is currently based in Bengaluru, India.
Juned has professional experience as a Full Stack Web Development Intern, AI & Robotics Master Trainer, TinkerLab Trainer Intern, and System Administrator Intern.
At Edunet Foundation, Juned worked as a Full Stack Web Development Intern, where he built an online auction platform using the MERN stack and optimized backend APIs.

At Agilo Research (STEMpedia), Juned served as an AI & Robotics Master Trainer, conducting AI and robotics sessions, guiding students for CODEAVOUR competitions, and representing the organization at G20 events.
At Samarthanam Trust, Juned worked as a TinkerLab Trainer Intern, training teachers and students in Micro:bit, robotics, mobile app development, and 3D printing.
Juned interned as a System Administrator at Universal Computer Sales & Services, where he handled networking, server configuration, and system troubleshooting.
Juned has worked on several projects including an AI-powered 3D virtual tutor, real-time chatbot systems, deep learning applications, and full-stack MERN platforms.

AI Guru J is an intelligent 3D virtual Python tutor developed by Juned. It answers Python questions using an AI model, speaks using text-to-speech, and uses a lip-synced 3D avatar for interactive learning.
AI Guru J uses React, Three.js, FastAPI, a custom AI model with RAG architecture, speech recognition, text-to-speech, lip-sync animation, and MongoDB Atlas.
Juned developed a real-time chatbot application using React.js, Nhost, Hasura, and n8n, focusing on secure authentication and scalable messaging.
Juned built a Face Emotion Recognition system using TensorFlow, Keras, and OpenCV, training a convolutional neural network on the FER-2013 dataset.
Juned developed a full-stack Online Auction Platform using the MERN stack, supporting real-time bidding and user authentication.
Juned is pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at M. S. Ramaiah University of Applied Sciences with a CGPA of 8.41.
Before his degree, Juned completed a Diploma in Computer Science and Engineering from Dr. T. M. A. Pai Polytechnic, Manipal.

Junedâ€™s technical skills include Python, Java, C, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MySQL, TensorFlow, OpenCV, NumPy, Pandas, Docker, GitHub, REST APIs, OOP, DSA, and AI/ML concepts.
Juned has strong hands-on experience in AI and Machine Learning, including deep learning models, NLP-based chatbots, face emotion recognition, and AI-powered educational systems.
Juned has completed certifications in Generative AI, NoSQL & Big Data, Microsoft AI Classroom, MERN Stack development, and AI & Robotics.
Junedâ€™s achievements include training over 100 teachers in AI and robotics, building multiple AI-powered applications, and creating 3D and voice-enabled learning platforms.
Junedâ€™s career goal is to build scalable AI-driven systems and immersive learning platforms that combine artificial intelligence, software engineering, and 3D visualization.
Juned should be hired for his strong full stack and AI skills, real-world project experience, teaching background, and ability to deliver complete intelligent solutions.
